values.caption: Single-ended channels: unsigned conversions Differential channels: signed conversions
values.name: SE_CH: unsigned, DF_CH: signed

values.caption: Single-ended channels: signed conversions Differential channels: unsigned conversions
values.name: SE_CH: signed, DF_CH: unsigned

values.caption: No hardware trigger, only software trigger can start conversions
values.name: Software Trigger

values.caption: Rising edge of the selected trigger event, defined in ADC_MR.TRGSEL
values.name: External Trigger : Rising Edge

values.caption: Falling edge of the selected trigger event
values.name: External Trigger : Falling Edge

values.caption: Any edge of the selected trigger event
values.name: External Trigger : Any Edge

values.caption: Request to DMA is generated as soon as one data is written in FIFO when FIFO is enabled. CHUNK is not used.
values.name: Generate DMA Request if FIFO data >= 1

values.caption: Request to DMA is generated as soon as the number of written elements in the FIFO is greater than or equal to CHUNK.
values.name: Generate DMA Request if FIFO data >= CHUNK

values.caption: The highest index channel is driven by the output of the temperature sensor.
values.name: Output of the temperature sensor

values.caption: The highest index channel is driven by the reference voltage of the temperature sensor.
values.name: Reference voltage of the temperature sensor

values.caption: Generates the TEMPCHG flag in ADC_ISR when the converted data is lower than the low threshold of the window.
values.name: Vin < VLo

values.caption: Generates the TEMPCHG flag in ADC_ISR when the converted data is higher than the high threshold of the window.
values.name: Vin < VHi

values.caption: Generates the TEMPCHG flag in ADC_ISR when the converted data is in the comparison window.
values.name: VLo < Vin < VHi

values.caption: Generates the TEMPCHG flag in ADC_ISR when the converted data is out of the comparison window.
values.name: VHi < Vin < VLo
